title: A MERCILESS NIGHT
author: VD
content_html:
The second bonus track for THE ONLY SKULL album was released today, courtesy of the Soulsigma backers. A MERCILESS NIGHT was mastered by the same audio engineer who mastered the previous 12 tracks, so the heavy guitars are even crisper now. It’s available on UATV, on all the usual music platforms, and on YouTube.

DISCUSS ON SG
